name: voicehelden_assistant
description: -   **Vapi Assistant Config (`vapi_config.json`)**: "Gwen", the Voicehelden rep. Handles inbound calls, answers Qs about pricing/services, and captures leads. -   **n8n Workflow (`n8n_workflow.json`)**: Receives lead data and logs it. NOTE: For the live demo, the server below can also receive the webhook directly. -   **Live Demo System (`server.js`)**: A Node.js Express server that hosts:     -   `http://localhost:3000`: The Voicehelden landing page with Vapi widget.     -   `http://localhost:3000/admin`: A real-time dashboard of captured leads.     -   `http://localhost:3000/api/leads`: The webhook endpoint.
